Module CaseTools
Package case_toolsAssignment

Class SmartCalculator

java.lang.Object
case_toolsAssignment.SmartCalculator
public class SmartCalculator extends Object
A class that provides various calculation methods including simple interest, compound interest, mean, factorial, and percentage. The calculations are performed based on user input.
Since:
2024
Version:
6.9
Author:
joel
